table.name: vtiger_servicecomplaints
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_servicecomplaints` ( `servicecomplaintsid` int(11) NOT NULL, `related_to` int(11) NOT NULL, `productname` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `complaitype` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `complainantid` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `handleid` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `handletime` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `refundmoney` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `refundstatus` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `createid` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `complaicontent` text, `improvementadvise` text, `personalinsight` text, `modifiedtime` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`servicecomplaintsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
